abstract: Cravath, Swaine & Moore, prominent law firm and compensation trendsetter within industry, discloses current year's bonus range would be in same range as in 2015, from $15,000 to $100,000; lack of increase most likely reflects overall decline in business mergers and acquisitions, firm's specialty.

headline.print_headline: Bonuses Are Not Rising at Influential Law Firm
headline.main: Cravath Bonuses for Law Firm Associates Remain Unchanged

snippet: The year-end bonuses for associates at Wall Street law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore will be $15,000 to $100,000, according to an internal memo....
lead_paragraph: The year-end bonuses for associates at Wall Street law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore will be $15,000 to $100,000, according to an internal memo.
